rows.label: qev065204_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ugh. I thought I smelled something.
Looks like the livestock has wandered in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ha ha! Indeed, Sister. Though this clever little animal is
the one who took Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah ha ha ha! And [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] came back of [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] own accord?
[ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] must be just dying for a beating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0004
rows.name:
But is it so surprising, as a life born solely to serve as
a tool for our use?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0005
rows.name:
Such a creature SHOULD come to accept its punishment
and spare us the inconvenience of hunting it down.
So as a special reward, let us kill it ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0006
rows.name: Are you ready, my sisters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0007
rows.name:
By all means, let's be done with this soon.
It's nearly time for tea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0008
rows.name:
A nice bit of exercise before snack time sounds fine.
I'm ready to rend some flesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0009
rows.name:
Then let us begin. ...You there! Animal!
You may use these final breaths to curse your birth
as a lesser organism![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0019
rows.name:
We have traveled far and subjugated the inferior races
of many planets together with our mother, Fortun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0020
rows.name:
It is as a law of the universe. And surely livestock
cannot be happy without the hand of a master to
guide them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0021
rows.name:
Are you really incapable of seeing even so obvious a
truth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_JNK0010
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev065204_SEL0011
rows.name: Retort that you're working to build a world of equals.

rows.label: qev065204_JNK0020
rows.name: Debate

rows.label: qev065204_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say that you don't see their point
as either obvious or true.

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0022
rows.name:
Ha ha! Nowhere in all existence will you find equality.
The very thought is unnatural.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0023
rows.name:
You will learn that now. You will see you are now—
and will forever remain—weaklings![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0024
rows.name:
Then you acknowledge your own inferiority! No matter.
Livestock never understands until the whip meets their
back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0025
rows.name:
We will teach you that now—so thoroughly that even
you might ken it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0026
rows.name: Ha ha... I can no longer hear Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0027
rows.name:
Tell me this, [ST:playername ].
Before you go...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0028
rows.name:
Yes, we have deceived you.
Yes, we've claimed lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0029
rows.name:
But that is our job. In this finite universe of ours,
it is the sacred duty of superior beings to weigh the
value of all life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0030
rows.name:
Do you truly believe that humanity—in its weakness,
ignorance, and hubris—really merits survival?
Even at the cost of eliminating superior life like us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev065204_SEL0031
rows.name: Give a determined nod.

rows.label: qev065204_JNK0040
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: qev065204_SEL0041
rows.name: Declare that no life is superior or inferior to another.

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0031
rows.name: And that is why your kind is hopeless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0032
rows.name: You are a fool. And that is why your kind is hopeless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065204_MSG0033
rows.name:
This time we will show you the paltry worth of your
human life by force![ST:wait ]
